verses.verse: For freedom <WG1657> did <WG3739> Christ <WG5547> set <WG1659> us <WG2248> free <WG1657>: stand fast <WG4739> therefore <WG3767>, and <WG2532> be <WG1758> not <WG3361> entangled <WG1758> again <WG3825> in a yoke <WG2218> of bondage <WG1397>.

Behold <WG1492>, I <WG1473> Paul <WG3972> say <WG3004> unto you <WG5213>, that <WG3754>, if <WG1437> ye receive circumcision <WG4059>, Christ <WG5547> will profit <WG5623> you <WG5209> nothing <WG3762>.

Yea <WG1161>, I testify <WG3143> again <WG3825> to every <WG3956> man <WG444> that receiveth circumcision <WG4059>, that <WG3754> he is <WG2076> a debtor <WG3781> to do <WG4160> the <WG3551> whole <WG3650> law <WG3551>.
Ye are severed <WG2673> from <WG575> Christ <WG5547>, ye <WG2673> who would <WG3748> be justified <WG1344> by <WG1722> the law <WG3551>; ye are fallen away from <WG1601> grace <WG5485>.
For <WG1063> we <WG2249> through the Spirit <WG4151> by <WG1537> faith <WG4102> wait for <WG553> the hope <WG1680> of righteousness <WG1343>.

For <WG1063> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> neither <WG3777> circumcision <WG4061> availeth <WG2480> anything <WG5100>, nor <WG3777> uncircumcision <WG203>; but <WG235> faith <WG4102> working <WG1754> through <WG1223> love <WG26>.
Ye were running <WG5143> well <WG2573>; who <WG5101> hindered <WG348> you <WG5209> that ye should <WG3982> not <WG3361> obey <WG3982> the truth <WG1465>?
This <WG3588> persuasion <WG3988> came not <WG3756> of <WG1537> him that <WG3588> calleth <WG2564> you <WG5209>.
A little <WG3398> leaven <WG2219> leaveneth <WG2220> the <WG5445> whole <WG3650> lump <WG5445>.

I <WG1473> have confidence <WG3982> to <WG1519> you-ward <WG5209> in <WG1722> the Lord <WG2962>, that <WG3754> ye will be <WG5426> none <WG3762> otherwise <WG243> minded <WG5426>: but <WG1161> he that <WG3588> troubleth <WG5015> you <WG5209> shall bear <WG941> his <WG3588> judgment <WG3748>, whosoever <WG302> he be <WG5600>.

But <WG1161> I <WG1473>, brethren <WG80>, if <WG1487> I <WG2784> still <WG2089> preach <WG2784> circumcision <WG4061>, why <WG5101> am I <WG1377> still <WG2089> persecuted <WG1377>? then <WG686> hath <WG2673> the stumbling-block <WG4625> of the cross <WG4716> been done away <WG2673>.
I would <WG3785> that they that <WG3588> unsettle <WG387> you <WG5209> would <WG609> even <WG2532> go beyond circumcision <WG609>.

For <WG1063> ye <WG5210>, brethren <WG80>, were called <WG2564> for <WG1909> freedom <WG1657>; only <WG3440> use not <WG3361> your freedom <WG1657> for <WG1519> an occasion <WG874> to the flesh <WG4561>, but <WG235> through <WG1223> love <WG26> be servants <WG1398> one to another <WG240>.

For <WG1063> the whole <WG3956> law <WG3551> is fulfilled <WG4137> in <WG1722> one <WG1520> word <WG3056>, even in <WG1722> this <WG3588>: Thou shalt love <WG25> thy <WG4675> neighbor <WG4139> as <WG5613> thyself <WG1438>.
But <WG1161> if <WG1487> ye bite <WG1143> and <WG2532> devour <WG2719> one another <WG240>, take heed <WG991> that ye be <WG355> not <WG3361> consumed <WG355> one <WG240> of <WG5259> another <WG240>.
But I say <WG3004>, <WG1161> walk <WG4043> by the Spirit <WG4151>, and <WG2532> ye shall <WG5055> not3756, 3361 fulfil <WG5055> the lust <WG1939> of the flesh <WG4561>.

For <WG1063> the flesh <WG4561> lusteth <WG1937> against <WG2596> the Spirit <WG4151>, and <WG1161> the Spirit <WG4151> against <WG2596> the flesh <WG4561>; for <WG1161> these <WG5023> are contrary <WG480> the one to the other <WG240>; that <WG2443> ye <WG4160> may not <WG3361> do <WG4160> the things <WG5023> that3739, Leviticus2 ye would <WG2309>.
But <WG1161> if <WG1487> ye are led <WG71> by the Spirit <WG4151>, ye are <WG2075> not <WG3756> under <WG5259> the law <WG3551>.
Now <WG1161> the works <WG2041> of the flesh <WG4561> are <WG2076> manifest <WG5318>, which <WG3748> are <WG2076> these <WG3430>: fornication <WG4202>, uncleanness <WG167>, lasciviousness <WG766>,
idolatry <WG1495>, sorcery <WG5331>, enmities <WG2189>, strife <WG2052>, jealousies <WG2205>, wraths <WG2372>, factions <WG2052>, divisions <WG1370>, parties <WG139>,

envyings <WG5355>, <WG5408> drunkenness <WG3178>, revellings <WG2970>, and <WG2532> such <WG5125> like <WG3664>; of which <WG3739> I forewarn <WG4302> you <WG5213>, even <WG4302> as <WG2531> I did4277, 2532 forewarn <WG4277> you <WG3754>, that they who <WG3588> practise <WG4238> such things <WG5108> shall <WG2816> not <WG3756> inherit <WG2816> the kingdom <WG932> of God <WG2316>.

meekness <WG4236>, self-control <WG1466>; against <WG2596> such <WG5108> there is <WG2076> no <WG3756> law <WG3551>.
And <WG1161> they that are <WG3588> of Christ <WG5547> Jesus have crucified <WG4717> the flesh <WG4561> with <WG4862> the passions <WG3804> and <WG2532> the lusts thereof <WG1939>.
If <WG1487> we live <WG2198> by the Spirit <WG4151>, by the Spirit <WG4151> let us <WG4748> also <WG2532> walk <WG4748>.
Let us <WG1096> not <WG3361> become <WG1096> vainglorious <WG2755>, provoking <WG4292> one another <WG240>, envying <WG5354> one another <WG240>.
